title: Guns N Roses - (1987) Appetite for Destruction [320kbs] ~~Renova
description:
Appetite for Destruction is the debut studio album by American hard rock band Guns N' Roses, released on July 21, 1987 on Geffen Records. It was well received by critics and topped the American Billboard 200 chart. 

As of September 2008, the album has been certified 18 times Platinum by the RIAA, making it the best-selling record released on Geffen. The album is featured in the book 1001 Albums You Must Hear Before You Die.
